automations.text: After PO Expiration Minutes Payment Button will not work. Keep it 0 (Zero) for never expiry.

chatwidget.text: Ends when user leaves the page

The Custom Data Attribute augments the capabilities of the Chat Widget. Attaching this attribute to any HTML tag allows the Chat Widget to activate upon clicking the tag, resulting in a popup display.
chatwidget.translation: خاصية البيانات المخصصة تزيد من قدرات أداة المحادثة. إضافة هذه الخاصية إلى أي علامة HTML يسمح بتفعيل أداة المحادثة عند النقر على العلامة، مما يؤدي إلى عرض نافذة منبثقة.

chatwidget.text: Example to Implement Custom Data Attribute
chatwidget.translation: مثال على تطبيق خاصية البيانات المخصصة

The "Remove Duplication" functionality is currently in the Beta phase. We advise exporting contacts to create a backup before initiating the process to prevent any potential data loss.
The oldest record (imported/added) will be retained, and the custom fields of all duplicates will be combined and stored with this record.
The most recent (imported/added) record will be retained, and the custom fields of all duplicates will be merged and saved with this record.
